about_me.title: Who I Am
about_me.headline: About me
about_me.text: Hi, I’m a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Gelsenkirchen. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
about_me.description_1: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Gelsenkirchen and remotely.
about_me.description_2: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code. It's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.
about_me.description_3: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to further improve my knowledge and skills.

skill.title: Technologies
skill.headline: Skill Set
skill.interests: I have a special interest in learning
skill.text: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range  of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new  technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and  stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skill.text_contact_me: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.headline: My Work
projects.text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

project_dialog.question: What is this project about?
project_dialog.description_join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
project_dialog.description_el_pollo_loco: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
project_dialog.description_da_bubble: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

quotes.robert: Our project benefited tremendously from Dennis' efficient way of working.
quotes.björn: Working together was smooth and a lot of fun. It was a great experience coding with such a dedicated and skilled partner.
quotes.markus: Dennis is a reliable and friendly person. He works in a structured manner and writes clear, easy-to-understand code. I can highly recommend him as a colleague.

contact.message_missing: What would you like to develop?
contact.name_missing: Oops! Your name seems to be missing
contact.success_closing: I will respond as soon as possible.
contact.privacy_end: and agree to the processing of my data as described.
contact.about_text: Contact me through this form, I'm interested in hearing about your ideas and would love to contribute to your projects.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.paragraph_1_1: This Privacy Policy informs you about the nature, scope, and purpose of the processing of personal data when using our website. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with statutory data protection regulations and this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy.paragraph_1_2: The protection of your data is important to us. We have created this Privacy Policy to explain to you, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), what information we collect and how we use it. This policy was created with the help of the

interpretation.headline: Legal Basis
interpretation.paragraph: The processing of your personal data is based on various legal grounds of the GDPR: consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a), contract performance (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b), legal obligation (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. c), or legitimate interest (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR).

definition.headline: Definitions
definition.paragraph: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:

description.account: means a personal account created for you to use our services with individual settings.
description.affiliate: means a company affiliated with us that is under common control or in which we have a stake.
description.company: refers to Dennis Dumin as the responsible entity within the meaning of the GDPR, based in Gelsenkirchen, Germany.
description.cookies: small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website and enable an analysis of your usage.
description.country: Germany, whereby data processing takes place within the European Union and is subject to the regulations of the GDPR.
description.device: any internet-capable device such as a computer, smartphone, tablet or other device that can access our services.
description.personal_data: any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (e.g., name, email address).
description.service: all offers, functions and services provided through our website dennis-dumin.net.
description.service_provider: natural or legal persons who process personal data on our behalf (e.g., hosting providers).
description.using_date: automatically collected data such as IP address, browser type, pages visited and length of stay that arise when using our website.
description.website: the web presence of Dennis Dumin accessible at dennis-dumin.net including all subpages.
description.you: the person visiting our website or using our services, regardless of whether they are registered or not.

paragraph.text: When using our contact form or during other interactions with our website, we only collect the data that is necessary for the respective function. The provision of this data is always voluntary. The following personal data may be collected:
paragraph.name: First and last name (for personal address)

paragraph.text_1: Certain technical data is automatically collected each time you access our website, which is technically necessary to provide our services.
paragraph.text_2: This data includes: IP address (in anonymized form), browser type and version, operating system used, URL of the previously visited page, time of server request, and amount of data transferred. This data is stored in log files and automatically deleted after 7 days.
paragraph.text_3: When using mobile devices, additional device-specific information may be collected, such as device type, screen resolution, and operating system version, to ensure optimal display. This data is not merged with other personal data.
paragraph.text_4: This data is collected based on our legitimate interest pursuant to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR to optimize and economically operate our website.

pragraph.text_1: Our website only uses technically necessary cookies that are required for the functionality of the website. These cookies enable basic functions such as page navigation and access to secure areas. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.
pragraph.text_2: We do not use tracking cookies, analytics tools, or profiling technologies that would track your usage behavior or create a profile of your online activities. We respect your privacy and limit ourselves to what is technically necessary.
pragraph.text_3: The cookies we use serve exclusively the following purposes:

list.beacons: No web beacons or tracking pixels

description.cookies: These cookies are necessary for the operation of the website and cannot be disabled in your system settings. These cookies are usually only set in response to actions you take that correspond to a service request, such as setting your privacy preferences or filling out forms. You can set your browser to block these cookies or to notify you about these cookies, but some parts of the website will then not work.
description.becons: We deliberately refrain from using web beacons, tracking pixels and similar technologies that could be used to track user activities across different services and websites. Our website does not contain elements that transmit data to third parties without your knowledge.

personal_data.headline: Your Rights as a Data Subject
personal_data.paragraph_text_1: As a data subject, you have the following rights:
personal_data.paragraph_text_2: You have the right to obtain information about the personal data we have stored about you (Art. 15 GDPR).
personal_data.paragraph_text_3: You have the right to request the correction of inaccurate data or the completion of incomplete data (Art. 16 GDPR).
personal_data.paragraph_text_4: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data stored by us, insofar as there is no legal obligation to retain it (Art. 17 GDPR).
personal_data.paragraph_text_5: You have the right to restrict the processing of your personal data (Art. 18 GDPR).
personal_data.paragraph_text_6: You have the right to receive your data in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format or to request the transfer to another controller (Art. 20 GDPR).
personal_data.paragraph_text_7: You have the right to withdraw a given consent at any time with effect for the future (Art. 7 para. 3 GDPR).
personal_data.paragraph_text_8: You have the right to object at any time to the processing of your personal data for reasons arising from your particular situation (Art. 21 GDPR).
personal_data.paragraph_text_9: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority if you believe that the processing of your personal data violates the GDPR (Art. 77 GDPR).

share.paragraph_text_1: We only transfer your data to service providers if this is necessary for the provision of our services (e.g., hosting providers). All service providers are carefully selected and contractually obligated to comply with data protection regulations.
share.paragraph_text_2: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. This does not apply to trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, provided they agree to keep the information confidential.
share.paragraph_text_3: Data will only be transferred to third parties if this is legally required or if you have expressly consented.
share.paragraph_text_4: We do not use services that share data with third parties for advertising purposes.
share.paragraph_text_5: Our website does not contain components of social networks that would automatically transmit data to these platforms.
share.paragraph_text_6: When contacting us via our form, your data will be treated confidentially and used exclusively to answer your inquiry.

personal_security.headline: Data Security
personal_security.paragraph_text: We use technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against accidental or intentional manipulation, loss, destruction, or access by unauthorized persons. Our security procedures are regularly reviewed and adapted to technological progress. However, data transmission on the internet may have security vulnerabilities, so absolute protection cannot be guaranteed.

changes.headline: Updates and Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.paragraph_text_1: This Privacy Policy is currently valid and was last updated on April 24, 2025.
changes.paragraph_text_2: Due to the further development of our website or due to changed legal or regulatory requirements, it may become necessary to amend this Privacy Policy.
changes.paragraph_text_3: The current Privacy Policy can be accessed at any time on this website. We recommend that you regularly check the current status.

contact.headline: Contact the Data Protection Officer
contact.paragraph_text_1: If you have questions about data protection or exercising your rights, please feel free to contact us:

data_mining.text: Reservation of use for text and data mining: The owner of this website permits the use or downloading of content from this website by third parties for the development, training, or operation of artificial intelligence or other machine learning systems ("text and data mining") exclusively with the explicit written consent of the owner. Without such consent, it is prohibited to use the content for text and data mining. This also applies if there are no meta-specifications on the website that exclude corresponding procedures, and even if bots that have the purpose of reading the website for text and data mining purposes are not blocked.

legal_notice.genaerator_text: Created with free privacy generator by Dr. Thomas Schwenke

headline.data_mining: Reservation of Use for Text and Data Mining
headline.law: Dispute Resolution and Consumer Dispute Settlement
headline.name: Service Provider
headline.social_media: Social Media and Other Online Presences

law.text: We are neither willing nor obligated to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

rights.text_1: Copyright and trademark rights: All content displayed on this website, such as texts, photographs, graphics, brands, and trademarks, are protected by the respective protective rights (copyrights, trademark rights). The use, reproduction, etc. are subject to our rights or the rights of the respective authors or rights holders.
rights.text_2: Notices of legal violations: Should you notice legal violations within our website, we ask you to inform us about them. We will remove illegal content and links immediately upon notification.

social_media.text: This imprint also applies to the following social media presences and online profiles:

legal_notice.title: Legal Notice
